# King safety enforced FEN debug evals (2025-10-01)

# FEN: 4r1k1/pp5p/1qn1bQ2/4r1p1/P1p1p3/B1P3P1/2P1P1BP/1R1R3K b - - 0 26
SeaJay Chess Engine v20250920

uciok

=== Evaluation Breakdown ===

Game Phase: 213/256 (MG: 83%, EG: 16%)

-- Material --
  Material:             +0.18 cp

-- Piece Square Tables --
  PST (MG):             -0.79 cp
  PST (EG):             -1.04 cp
  PST (interpolated):   -0.83 cp [213*MG + 43*EG / 256]

-- Pawn Structure --
  Isolated pawns:      -0.46 cp
  Doubled pawns:        -0.08 cp
  Pawn islands:         -0.05 cp

-- Piece Evaluation --
  Bishop pair:          +0.20 cp
  Mobility:             +0.14 cp (WN:0 WB:0 WR:0 WQ:0 | BN:0 BB:0 BR:0 BQ:0)
  Rook on files:        +0.40 cp

-- King Safety --
  King safety:          +1.53 cp

-- Total (White perspective) --
  Sum of components:    +1.03 cp

  Calculation: mat(+0.18) + pst(-0.83) + isolated(-0.46) + doubled(-0.08) + islands(-0.05) + bishop-pair(+0.20) + mobility(+0.14) + rook-files(+0.40) + king-safety(+1.53)

-- Final Score --
  From Black's perspective: -1.03 cp

=== Evaluation Breakdown ===

Game Phase: 213/256 (MG: 83%, EG: 16%)

-- Material --
  Material:             +0.37 cp

-- Piece Square Tables --
  PST (MG):             +0.36 cp
  PST (EG):             +0.08 cp
  PST (interpolated):   +0.31 cp [213*MG + 43*EG / 256]

-- Pawn Structure --
  Passed pawns:         +0.22 cp (W:1 B:0)
  Doubled pawns:        +0.08 cp

-- Piece Evaluation --
  Bishop pair:          -0.20 cp
  Mobility:             -0.16 cp (WN:9 WB:0 WR:0 WQ:0 | BN:0 BB:0 BR:0 BQ:0)
  Rook on files:        -0.15 cp

-- King Safety --
  King safety:          +0.46 cp

-- Total (White perspective) --
  Sum of components:    +0.93 cp

  Calculation: mat(+0.37) + pst(+0.31) + passed(+0.22) + doubled(+0.08) + bishop-pair(-0.20) + mobility(-0.16) + rook-files(-0.15) + king-safety(+0.46)

-- Final Score --
  From Black's perspective: -0.93 cp

=== Evaluation Breakdown ===

Game Phase: 117/256 (MG: 45%, EG: 54%)

-- Material --
  Material:             -2.33 cp

-- Piece Square Tables --

  PST (EG):             +0.46 cp
  PST (interpolated):   +0.52 cp [117*MG + 139*EG / 256]

-- Pawn Structure --
  Doubled pawns:        +0.08 cp

-- Piece Evaluation --
  Mobility:             +0.16 cp (WN:0 WB:0 WR:0 WQ:0 | BN:0 BB:0 BR:0 BQ:0)
  Rook on files:        +0.50 cp

-- King Safety --
  King safety:          -0.28 cp

-- Total (White perspective) --
  Sum of components:    -1.35 cp

  Calculation: mat(-2.33) + pst(+0.52) + doubled(+0.08) + mobility(+0.16) + rook-files(+0.50) + king-safety(-0.28)

-- Final Score --
  From White's perspective: -1.35 cp

# FEN: r2r2k1/pp3ppp/1n1Nq2n/1R2P3/3p4/B4QPP/P1P2P2/5BK1 b - - 0 25

info string NOTE: SeaJay uses negamax scoring - all evaluations are from the side-to-move perspective. Positive scores mean the current player to move is winning.
uciok

=== Evaluation Breakdown ===

Game Phase: 203/256 (MG: 79%, EG: 20%)

-- Material --
  Material:             -1.32 cp

-- Piece Square Tables --
  PST (MG):             +0.10 cp
  PST (EG):             +0.15 cp
  PST (interpolated):   +0.11 cp [203*MG + 53*EG / 256]

-- Pawn Structure --
  Isolated pawns:      -0.24 cp

-- Piece Evaluation --
  Bishop pair:          +0.20 cp
  Mobility:             +0.24 cp (WN:7 WB:0 WR:0 WQ:0 | BN:0 BB:0 BR:0 BQ:0)
  Knight outposts:      +0.35 cp
  Rook on files:        +0.15 cp

-- King Safety --
  King safety:          -0.53 cp

-- Total (White perspective) --
  Sum of components:    -1.04 cp

  Calculation: mat(-1.32) + pst(+0.11) + isolated(-0.24) + bishop-pair(+0.20) + mobility(+0.24) + outposts(+0.35) + rook-files(+0.15) + king-safety(-0.53)

-- Final Score --
  From Black's perspective: +1.04 cp
